---
title: highlight first line
format: html
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureHtmlElements:
        - ['pre.sourceCode.number-lines']
        - ['#cb1[data-code-line-numbers="1"]']
    revealjs:
      ensureHtmlElements:
        - ['#cb1[data-code-line-numbers="1"]', 'pre.sourceCode.number-lines']
        - []
    docusaurus-md:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - ['[`]{3}r \{1\} showLineNumbers']
        - []
execute: 
  echo: true
---

```{r}
#| code-line-numbers: "1"
mean(
  c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
)
```
